channel.title: Need help having certain weapons require certain ammo!
channel.description: Ok there is 2 problems with this 1.) I need to change karils bow from rune arrows to need bolt racks, and 2.) I need comp ogre bow to require ice arrows....HELP PLEASE I looked at my items and nothing seemed too wrong in client.java but I dunno..

item.title: Need help having certain weapons require certain ammo!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

No results but some things are like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) { PkingDelay = 4; wepdelay = 4; UseBow = true; }

and

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) { // Karils x-bow playerSE = 2074; playerSEA = 2075; playerSEW = 2076; playerSER = 2077; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help having certain weapons require certain ammo!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Chassy13:

Wait a minute, you’re editing the wrong method. You are editing the getWepAnim method, not the method that checks the arrows.

Ah, again, I overlook the obvious.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 09:26:32 pm[/size][hr]Try this -

if (UseBow && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) { hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()); if (DeleteArrow() && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740) { lastArrow = System.currentTimeMillis(); arrow = true; actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { ResetAttack(); sM("Message"); return false;
